sofa1.name: SAMSON Sofa
sofa1.description: Every Delilah needs her Samson. That was the inspiration for our Samson Collection - to make a sharp, clean, contemporary companion for our popular Delilah style. The Samson is a classic frame with modern charm. The rolled bolster pillows add an extra pop of character and comfort. The squared design is uncluttered and allows the Samson to look incredible no matter the style of your home. Upgrade your space with the beautiful Samson Collection.

sofa2.name: SCOTT Sofa
sofa2.description: Be honest - when was the last time you met a guy named Scott who wasn't one of the coolest dudes around? Kyle Schuneman knows the power of Scott, which is why he bestowed the name on his Scott Sofa collection. Scott is designed like modern art that is meant to be used rather than locked away in an exhibit. The thin arms, conical legs and straightforward design give you a canvas to customize the Scott Sofa and make it even more swell. Select your favorite fabric color and leg finish, add a couple throw pillows and you'll have a sofa partner for life. Made in the U.S. and delivered to your home, this modern sofa will be the one for girls and guys alike. Part of the Kyle Schuneman collection, the Scott is unapologetic modern design.

sofa3.name: BRENTWOOD 2pc Sleeper Sectional
sofa3.description: The Brentwood 2 Piece Sleeper Sectional Sofa is the point where sophistication, comfort, and versatility intersect. Button tufting on the back cushions, a solid wood base with tapered legs, and thick arms provide the Brentwood with an elegant and formal profile. The 2.0 high density foam seat cushions and bumper chaise provide all the comfort you and your family (and your pets) will ever need. But the Brentwood doesn't stop there! The Brentwood 2 Piece Sleeper Sectional Sofa also features a Queen-Size Deluxe Innerspring Mattress. The Brentwood is proof that a sleeper sofa doesn't have to sacrifice form for function.

sofa4.name: MULHOLLAND Drive 2pc Sleeper Sectional
sofa4.description: As stunning as the views along Mulholland Drive, this two-piece sleeper sectional will offer an instant upgrade to your living room style. Its 2 piece shape creates an intimate setting for entertaining guests, or the ultimate spot to sprawl out for an afternoon of binge watching Netflix. The Mulholland's solid wood base adds to its modern look, while its understated design will coordinate well with your existing decor. The Mulholland Drive is a stunning addition to our popular Mulholland collection. Available in over 50 pet friendly and kid friendly fabrics and three glamorous wood stains, the Mulholland Drive is perfect for your modern home, apartment, or small space.

sofa5.name: CARSON Apartment Size Sofa
sofa5.description: If you choose one midcentury item for your apartment, make sure it's the Carson Apartment Size Sofa. It's both retro and futuristic (look it up - it's a thing), with a flared silhouette, tufted back cushioning and a solid pecan wood base. Look at how those legs angle outward adding to the modern aesthetic. And this sofa isn't just about looks. We're not shallow! Its deep cushions and solid back make for a comfortable respite far from the busy world. This sofa was built with apartment dwellers in mind - we know space is a hot commodity and the Carson is just what you need if square footage is at a minimum.

sofa6.name: PHANTOM Sofa with Power Foot Rest
sofa6.description: The Phantom Sofa in soft, elegant velvet will give you one more reason to love getting home after a long day out. This chic, compact modern masterpiece has a sturdy solid-wood-and-plywood frame, contemporary channel-tufting on the back and arms, and two side-by-side power footrests for when it’s time to put your feet up (power controls are out of view between the armrest and seat cushion). Add to these features the Phantom Sofa’s on-trend track arms, minimalist chrome-finish legs, and low-profile styling that adds an airy feel to your room. The Phantom is more than just another pretty sofa, too. Its no-sag spring cushions with 2.5 high-density foam cores offer premium comfort and support. You can also remove the seat cushion covers for convenient cleaning.

sofa7.name: SAMSON Sofa Lounger
sofa7.description: This gorgeous new sofa from Apt2B is the hottest style of the summer! The Samson is part sofa, part chaise, and 100% comfortable. This "fainting chaise" can be used as a sofa that comfortably sits 2-3 people OR a traditional chaise that will have you lounging for days and days! Every Delilah needs her Samson. That was the inspiration for our Samson Collection - to make a sharp, clean, contemporary companion for our popular Delilah style. The Samson is a classic frame with modern charm. The rolled bolster pillows add an extra pop of character and comfort. The squared design is uncluttered and allows the Samson to look incredible no matter the style of your home.

sofa8.name: MILES Sofa
sofa8.description: They’ve written many a song about going the distance…1,000 miles to be exact, and our new Miles collection is definitely worthy of its moniker. It’s a little bit retro, a little bit classic (mid-century), with clean sleek lines—and a friendly price point—that have a place in every contemporary home. Miles features a bucket-style seat with a low profile, perfect for spaces big and small. Details include angled legs in a natural wood finish, a tight back and fixed cushions for fuss-free lounging.

sofa9.name: FILLMORE Sofa
sofa9.description: Just like the Fillmore auditoriums are the place for the hottest music, the Fillmore Collection from Kyle Schuneman will make your home the place for the hottest living. The Fillmore sofa is like a sophisticated star that's extended their prime through hard work. This spacious, 26-inch deep sofa has a full stainless steel base and wide design that will fill more of your space with modern style (yes, we like word play- don't judge us).

sofa10.name: PICO Sofa
sofa10.description: The Pico Collection has something that's hard to find: classic elegance that works perfectly in a modern setting. Between the unique stitching, tufted accents of the back cushion and its old-school legs, this collection gives new-school flavor to a well-known look. The arms roll slightly for increased depth, adding to the sophistication of this piece.

sofa11.name: GRAHAM Sofa
sofa11.description: When one of you likes chunky channel tufting and the other is like “what’s tufting?” let the Graham Collection be your seating style tie-breaker. An exposed wood base is a subtle nod to the mid-century, when, according to TV depictions of the era, people were too busy shaking up cocktails to bother with fluffing back cushions. Don’t worry, the Graham’s tight back design leaves plenty of time for happy hour.

sofa12.name: JENSEN Leather Sofa
sofa12.description: It doesn’t get more classically cool than the Jensen Leather Sofa. Better-with-age top-grain camel colored leather edges up the timeless mid-century silhouette, while its tufted bench seat and bolster pillows add the perfect pinch of visual interest. Some might say it’s the secret ingredient—maybe even the X-factor—your living room "recipe" is craving.

sofa13.name: LOGAN Drive Loveseat
sofa13.description: This couch was designed specifically for apartment living - so it's not too big, it's not too small - it's just right. Relax on the soft cushions and kick your feet up after a day at the office. Enjoy your choice of fabrics and browse all of our different colors. Whether you want to stick to a classic shade or you crave something bright and vivid, we've got it. The Logan Drive Loveseat comes with a lifetime warranty. Add a bit of vintage glamour to your space with the Logan Drive. A solid wood base and button tufted back cushions take this modern shape to an elevated level. The ultimate show piece for your stylish room.

table1.name: AIKEN Dining Table
table1.description: Every Delilah needs her Samson. That was the inspiration for our Samson Collection - to make a sharp, clean, contemporary companion for our popular Delilah style. The Samson is a classic frame with modern charm. The rolled bolster pillows add an extra pop of character and comfort. The squared design is uncluttered and allows the Samson to look incredible no matter the style of your home. Upgrade your space with the beautiful Samson Collection.

table2.name: WHITAKER Round Dining Table
table2.description: The Whitaker Round Dining Table is a contemporary take on a traditional style. The solid Ash frame is finished in a dark Walnut stain that's a glamorous homage to Mid Century Modern style. The sharp, clean, uncluttered design makes this a piece that will look incredible in any space. The lacquered surfaces keep the entire design looking neat and tidy. At 47"w this round dining table can seat 4 comfortably.

table3.name: PARRISH Dining Table
table3.description: Crafted using solid recycled pine wood and sturdy iron legs, the Parrish Dining Table has an elegant, natural look and feel.

table4.name: AIKEN Coffee Table
table4.description: The Aiken Collection is made from Acacia wood and instantly warms up any space. Spend hours writing your memoir, host a dinner party or kick back and enjoy a cup of coffee with this beautiful brand new collection!

table5.name: ROLLINS Coffee Table
table5.description: The Rollins Collection blends vintage apothecary style drawer fronts and hardware with modern hairpin legs for a beautiful updated spin on an antique classic! The Rollins Coffee Table features a stunning Walnut finish and two roomy drawers for neatly storing your favorite magazines, games and other coffee table essentials!

table6.name: QUINN Coffee Table
table6.description: The Quinn Coffee Table is a true statement piece. Topped by a black-and-white geometric pattern and wrapped with a large brass rim, it perfectly balances a retro vibe with a modern glam feel.

table7.name: ACE Coffee Table
table7.description: Our collection names don’t always relate directly to the product they’re attached to, but this time, you could say we “aced” it. The Ace Collection gets an A for flexible, approachable style that would marry well with just about any room, no matter your aesthetic leanings. It’s the ace in the hole of your space’s design with solid acacia wood, warm oak veneer and modern, contemporary gold accents. Pair several pieces together for a cohesive look, or mix and match with our other lines. Either way, it’ll be aces (we’re done now, promise).

table8.name: SOLARA Storage Coffee Table
table8.description: The Solara Collection is vibrant and fun with a "sunburst" design made from recycled shipping pallet wood! Its white lacquered casing provides a crisp, clean outline for this stand-out collection!

table9.name: PASADENA Desk
table9.description: An intricate wood pattern makes the Pasadena Desk beautiful and eye-catching. Made of solid Sheesham wood, you're sure to get the creative juices flowing when working at this visually-dazzling desk.

table10.name: PATTAYA Desk
table10.description: The Pattaya Desk is crafted from solid reclaimed fir, has letter-box style hardware and set upon elegant metal hairpin legs. Plenty of storage with a rich, brown finish. Create a home office with style!

table11.name: RHYOLITE Console Table
table11.description: With a sleek sophisticated design, the Rhyolite Console Table emits rich hues from the solid mango wood's medium and dark stains. Perfect for adding a welcoming addition to your front entry, this console's two push drawers add versatile storage for everything you need whilst you're running out the door. This console table's sleek, universal design is sure to be a crowd favorite.

table12.name: KINGS ROAD Console Table
table12.description: The Kings Road Console Table is perfect for the entryway or dining room. With a high gloss lacquer top and chromed steel base, this table is sure to please.

table13.name: CHLOE Console Table
table13.description: Our Chloe Collection is contemporary, chic, classy, clean, and cool. Did we miss any other positive adjectives that start with 'C'? Does "completely awesome" count? The Chloe is all of the above and more. This sophisticated set has a playful elegance to it thanks to glamorous pops of gold, smooth white casing, and fun functionality. The Chloe Console Table maximizes style and storage. This beautiful entryway table has 4 sizable drawers for all of your storage needs.

table14.name: AIKEN Side Table
table14.description: The Aiken Collection is made from Acacia wood and instantly warms up any space. Spend hours writing your memoir, host a dinner party or kick back and enjoy a cup of coffee with this beautiful brand new collection!

table15.name: VALENTINE Side Table
table15.description: Sweet, delicate, and even a little bit sexy, the Valentine Side Table is aptly named and just waiting to live in your home. This side table has a mirrored top that you can use as to touch up your face in a pinch ;)

table16.name: GAIL Garden Stool
table16.description: A contoured wave design gives a contemporary feel to a this glazed ceramic garden stool. The soothing lines create timeless texture, sure to dress up your indoor or outdoor space. This multi-functional stool can be used as a side table or extra seating!

table17.name: MIDTOWN Side Table
table17.description: Solid natural Acacia wood, gold tipped legs and drawer pulls, and gorgeous mid century design give the Midtown Collection a timeless appeal that will look amazing in your home for years to come. This Side Table features an open storage space below the drawer, resulting in total accessibility of the night stand's space.

mirror1.name: SULLY Mirror
mirror1.description: Simple. Modern. Cool. There are plenty of words to describe the Sully mirror, but we think the word you should use is "mine". The powder coated black finish looks clean and will stand out against your wall.

mirror2.name: LIAM Mirror
mirror2.description: Add a cool visual flair to your home with the Liam mirror. The double mirror design and the black frame look great in just about any home decor style.

mirror3.name: DAISY Mirror
mirror3.description: Floral and fun, the Daisy Mirror's flower-like form is created from delicate strands of gold-finished steel for a sense of fluidity and visual momentum!

mirror4.name: PAIVI Mirror
mirror4.description: Add a contemporary flair to your space with the Paivi mirror. The wavy wire frame adds some depth to the wall and will look cool from every angle.

mirror5.name: MOORE Mirror
mirror5.description: TAdd a little class to your wall with the Moore mirror. The marble frame with brass inlays create a visual that is sure to get compliments.

mirror6.name: ELISHA Mirror
mirror6.description: The Elisha Mirror is a dazzling and unique way to add a mirror to your space. Half art piece and half mirror, the Elisha is sure to catch the attention of your guests! It will also help you see your space in a whole new way.

bed1.name: WESTMONT Low Profile Platform Bed
bed1.description: I'm ready for my closeup, Mr. Demille. Whether you're a budding Hollywood starlet or you're already a national treasure, the Westmont Low Profile Platform Bed is going to make you feel like a celebrity. This low profile platform bed is constructed using solid mahogany wood and is draped in glamorous black, wire-brushed mahogany veneers. The brushed-bronze steel base adds an extra touch of glitz to this already-dazzling design. The Westmont is a true platform bed with a slat system, which means that you do not need a box spring to support the mattress.

bed2.name: RESEDA Platform Bed
bed2.description: Mid-century style meets effortless Parisian cool, the Reseda bed is the “perfect red lip” of the bedroom. This vintage-inspired design showcases vertical channel tufting (très en vogue) on the headboard with an ultra-low profile footboard and angled espresso-finished wood feet. Consider the just-bold-enough teal velvet upholstery your style chameleon—it somehow works with just about any color scheme. And to keep things even more easy-breezy, the Reseda bed is mattress-ready, no box spring required.

bed3.name: CARTER Upholstered Bed
bed3.description: The Carter Upholstered Bed is an elegantly-crafted homage to Mid-Century Modern design with the benefits of modern and contemporary style. The Carter Upholstered Bed, designed by Kyle Schuneman, features an eye-catching channel tufted headboard and a set of stylish, angled, hardwood legs. An exposed hardwood base along the footboard and the headboard highlights the craftsmanship and detailing on this exquisite fabric upholstered bed. Your pets will also appreciate the 7.5"h legs, which provide plenty of room for exploration and afternoon naps. The Carter is a fully upholstered fabric bed, which means it looks incredible from every angle. And, trust us, you will want to admire this extra touch upholstery bed from every angle.

bed4.name: PARKER Platform Bed
bed4.description: The Parker Platform Bed takes traditional design and transforms it into a modern masterpiece. This Shaker-inspired platform bed features a shelter-style, wrap-around headboard comprised of elegant Pine spindles. The Bullnose edges soften corners for sleek and stylish contours. Tapered Pine legs and Windsor-style woodworking complete this elegant design. The Parker Platform Bed is an exquisite addition to your modern, rustic, or traditional home! The Parker is a true platform bed, which means that it does not require a box spring or other foundation. Place your mattress directly upon the sturdy and supportive solid wood slat system.

bed5.name: HOLLYRIDGE Storage Bed
bed5.description: Glamour! Fashion! Hollywood! The Hollyridge Collection is the very definition of glamorous. The Hollyridge Storage Bed has all the high style of the Hollyridge Collection with a more understated and versatile appeal. The tufted and upholstered headboard provides the Hollyridge Storage Bed with a refined elegance. The two storage drawers in the base of the footboard provide plenty of extra storage space for all of your needs. The solid wood frame is constructed with solid acacia wood and acacia veneers in a basalt grey finish. This is a true platform bed that does not require a box spring or other foundation for your mattress. Feel as fashionable as a Hollywood starlet in your Hollyridge Platform Bed!

bed6.name: BEACON Upholstered Bed
bed6.description: Enveloped in plush, pleated velvet with an elegant profile, the Beacon Upholstered Bed is dreamy in every sense of the word! Available in your choice of either Desert or Grey Velvet, the Beacon also comes in three sizes so no matter the square footage of your bedroom you can dream big!

bed7.name: LENOX Platform Bed
bed7.description: Don’t be square…unless we’re talking about the Lenox Collection. In that case, square away. The straight, angular lines of Lenox offer a commanding vibe while the rustic dark pine finish warms things up nicely. A low-profile platform gives off serious resort vibes because every night should feel like a dreamy staycation.

bed8.name: AIKEN Platform Bed
bed8.description: The Aiken Collection is made from Acacia wood and instantly warms up any space. This stylish bed also features a contrasting fabric headboard to kick your bedroom style up a notch!

chair1.name: HUDSON Accent Chair
chair1.description: The Hudson Chair is as cute as it gets. Gorgeous Jewel tones, velvet fabrication, button tufting, gold legs - The Hudson really packs a design punch in a small package.

chair2.name: INDIO Club Chair
chair2.description: The Indio Club Chair is as comfy and familiar as your favorite sweatshirt. Contemporary with a mid-century modern accent. Neutral modern grey color transitions for any decor. Great on its own or as a pair.

chair3.name: CLIVE Accent Chair
chair3.description: Suave and debonair is the best way to describe the Clive Accent Chair. The stately silhouette combines a comfy upholstered seat that rests upon a solid wood frame flanked by a set of deep bronze iron legs. It'll look right at home in your industrial or Mid-Century space.

chair4.name: Saxon King Chair
chair4.description: Get down with the Saxon! No, literally- this transitional sofa collection that brings a modern twist to shabby chic features ultra-plush down seat cushioning, making it our coziest sofa collection to date! A deep bench seat great for curling up and a classic turned leg highlight the high end design. And, it's framed by a very cool knife's edge trim on both the seat and back cushions (it's called a flange. Yeah we said it!).

chair5.name: ELSINORE Accent Chair
chair5.description: If Hamlet had an Elsinore Accent Chair to relax in and clear his mind, we think things at Kronborg Castle would have been a lot calmer and less bloody. Just like the many double meanings of Shakespeare, this teal accent chair is itself accented with silver nail heads, creating a cycle of accents he would have been proud of (only without kings and princes dying everywhere). The covering fabric is made from a durable woven polyester blend that adds comfort and subtle pleasure to any room. Each chair is affordably priced, and if you start seeing ghosts, we'll take it back without a hassle. Frailty, thy name is certainly not these teal accent chairs. The Elsinore Accent Chair is wonderfully accented with silver nail heads and a comfort that will make any room a more pleasant place to be.

chair6.name: NORA Chair From Kyle Schuneman
chair6.description: This sleek, and oversized chair has a tight channel-tufted back that has an art deco flair with a modern silhouette. With high arms and a high back this chair envelopes you like an old school restaurant booth but the deep seat has you staying for dessert.

chair7.name: Graham Club Chair
chair7.description: When one of you likes chunky channel tufting and the other is like “what’s tufting?” let the Graham Collection be your seating style tie-breaker. An exposed wood base is a subtle nod to the mid-century, when, according to TV depictions of the era, people were too busy shaking up cocktails to bother with fluffing back cushions. Don’t worry, the Graham’s tight back design leaves plenty of time for happy hour.

chair8.name: BBUCKLEY Bar Stool
chair8.description: Modern, industrial and chic (without sacrificing any comfort) the Buckley Bar Stool is as cool as they come. Elevate your kitchen or bar counter with a pair of these stools and you'll be in a happy place even before happy hour!

chair9.name: FAHEY Bar Stool GREY - Set of 2
chair9.description: Made from vegan leather, the Fahey Bar Stool has a minimal profile and a luxurious cushioned seat! Detailed stitching along the seat and and a sleek metal frame make these bar stools a real standout! Comes as a set of 2.

chair10.name: CLARISSA Bar Stool
chair10.description: The Clarissa Bar Stool is a head-turning, glamorous bar stool that's as comfortable as it is beautiful. The combination of its brushed stainless steel legs and its Desert Grey upholstery is timeless, iconic, and tasteful. The Clarissa features a unique design with arm rests, foot rests, and a low back. This bar stool is a stunning addition to your kitchen, bar, or dining area.

chair11.name: SARASOTA Rattan Counter Stool
chair11.description: The Sarasota Counter Stool expertly combines natural rattan with a Mid-Century style silhouette for a unique yet timeless design. The soft, neutral palette and sturdy mahogany wood frame ensure this chair will stand the test of time.

chair12.name: ALBANY Dining Chair - SET OF 2
chair12.description: A well-designed room needs a balance of subtly and show-stopping when it comes to its furniture. Our Albany Collection checks the “show-stopping” box top to bottom with grey fabric upholstery and an eye-catching solid acacia wood frame.

chair13.name: SYLMAR Side Chair  - SET OF 2
chair13.description: Slide into this stylish Sylmar Side Chair and experience supreme satisfaction. The solid Beech wood frame perfectly cradles your back while the rush seat provides excellent support and comfort. The Sylmar uses century-old techniques for finishing and staining the wood frame and attaching the rush seating. The wood frame is stain resistant and easy to clean. Use the Sylmar for your dining room, kitchen, or as additional seating in any room in the house. Also works great for use in your office! The Sylmar is available in a variety of different stains and seat finish colors. Find your favorite combination!

chair14.name: LULA Side Chair - SET OF 2
chair14.description: A cousin of the more minimalist Morris Chair, the Lula Side Chair steps up the game with a beautiful button-tufted back frame and brass-capped pencil legs that really pop!

chair15.name: DOHENY Dr Dining Chair - SET OF 2
chair15.description: The legendary Doheny family is famed in Los Angeles for a few things, specifically making massive amounts of money by drilling the first fruitful oil well in the city, and for the stunning Greystone Estate mansion they called home in the early 20th century, which they bought with their massive amounts of oil money. This story really has nothing to do with our Doheny Drive collection, but the beautiful American White Oak—available in two natural colorways—used throughout the line, vegan leather upholstered dining chairs and organic live edge detailing adds a *richness* and *stately* look (see what we did there?) to your dining room.

chair16.name: CAVANAGH Ottoman
chair16.description: Add a colorful modern touch to any room with the Cavanagh ottoman. The soft velvet feels luxurious and the modern legs will add a cool flair to any home decor.

chair17.name: MYRA 3pc Storage Ottoman Set
chair17.description: The Myra storage ottomans bring functionality and style to any space! Complete with one large and two smaller ottomans, the chic tufted top and lavish espresso feet make these the perfect accent pieces! Need a bench? What about a foot rest? Myra's your girl! The possibilities are endless! Perfect for apartments and smaller homes!

dresser1.name: WESTMONT Dresser
dresser1.description: The Westmont Dresser is a sophisticated and contemporary piece that features wire-brushed, solid Mahogany wood stained in a beautiful Black Oak finish. Not to mention the gorgeous gold-polished, brushed steel base. Curated by Kyle Schuneman as part of the Penthouse Collection, the Westmont is an austere bedroom set that has all the glitz and glam of Hollywood Regency style. The quality and craftsmanship of these pieces is everything the Penthouse Collection is all about - unrivaled form with everyday function. The distinctive "scalloped" drawer fronts are a not-so-coy nod to the Jazz Age and its affinity for glamorous Metropolitan design. The Westmont Dresser has 8 spacious drawers that feature sanded and stained interiors, full-extension ball bearing drawer glides, and constructed using English dovetail joinery. Why settle for anything less? You'll also find yourself smitten with the brushed brass, top mount bar pulls and the removable felt-lining in the top drawers. This black and gold dresser is a thoroughly modern dresser with all the cachet of Golden Age Hollywood. Want to complete the set? The Westmont and the Coco are perfect bedroom companions.

dresser2.name: GLENOAKS Dresser
dresser2.description: The Glenoaks Collection is a rustic modern masterpiece. If you've been searching for a modern wooden bedroom collection with solid construction, charming details, and a contemporary profile then you can end the search right now. The Glenoaks Dresser has everything you need and more. The case is constructed with solid mahogany and finished with smooth walnut veneers. The corner brackets, the base and tastefully-tapered legs, and the cupped drawer pulls are made from eye-catching bronzed brass. The smaller top drawers feature removable felt lining for your more delicate clothing items and every drawer has sanded and stained interiors. The drawers are attached using a smooth full-extension ball bearing drawer glide system and the joints are assembled with English dovetail joinery. This walnut dresser is a magnificent combination of small details that create a wholly-satisfying and complete package. No matter your style, the Glenoaks Collection has enough unique character for every modern bedroom.

dresser3.name: CHLOE Dresser
dresser3.description: You'll also be dazzled by the incredible amount of storage found in the Chloe Dresser! It features 7 spacious drawers for all of your wardrobe storage needs. 3 smaller drawers are perfect for delicates, while 4 larger drawers are ideal for your bulky items.

dresser4.name: JUNIPER Dresser
dresser4.description: You know what hot sauce and mid-century modern design have in common? They *basically* go with everything. Just like our Juniper Collection, which gets its striking look from unique Tasmanian Blackwood. From the simple and sophisticated profile of its dining and side tables to the French dovetail joinery and inset curved handles of the bar cabinet and media stands, the Juniper Collection is sure to be a hit no matter how you serve it up.

bookcase1.name: TUSTIN 5 Shelf Bookcase
bookcase1.description: Open style bookshelf. Rustic look. 5 shelves for display. What more can you say? I guess you could mention that it's absolutely stunning.

bookshelf2.name: SAWYER Round Wall Shelf
bookshelf2.description: One of our favorite accent pieces, the Sawyer wall shelf is the perfect rustic touch for any space! Use it to store spices, books, wine bottles, decanters, or any of your favorite decorative objects!

bookshelf3.name: VESPER 3 Shelf Side Table
bookshelf3.description: We all know that James Bond's signature drink is a martini - shaken, not stirred. Or is it? In the original book series, James Bond would actually order a cocktail of his own invention. That drink is now known as the Vesper (named after the femme fatale in 'Casino Royale'). It's a no-nonsense, boozy cocktail that has all the dashing elegance you would expect from James Bond. And it's exactly what you can expect from our handsome Vesper Collection.

bookshelf4.name: ACE Display Cabinet
bookshelf4.description: Our collection names don’t always relate directly to the product they’re attached to, but this time, you could say we “aced” it. The Ace Collection gets an A for flexible, approachable style that would marry well with just about any room, no matter your aesthetic leanings. It’s the ace in the hole of your space’s design with solid acacia wood, warm oak veneer and modern, contemporary gold accents. Pair several pieces together for a cohesive look, or mix and match with our other lines. Either way, it’ll be aces (we’re done now, promise).

bookshelf5.name: PARADA Bookcase
bookshelf5.description: The Parada Bookcase adds hip and modern storage and display space to any home or office. The playfully colored shelving units make this bookcase anything but ordinary!

rug1.name: Tameka Area Rug
rug1.description: Thanks to its power-loomed construction, the Tameka Area Rug is a durable option for any space in your home. The faded tribal pattern design gives this floor covering a free-spirited feel.

rug2.name: DRYDEN Area Rug
rug2.description: OElegant Persian motifs in muted colors with a faded, distressed treatment give the Dryden Area Rug a perfectly vintage, farmhouse-style look. Shades of charcoal and brown create a neutral-toned combination that will seamlessly blend with any décor. Hand woven in India from soft micro-chenille and cotton fibers, this stain-resistant rug has a worry-free flat pile making it perfect for high-traffic areas of your home.

rug3.name: NURAY Area Rug
rug3.description: A worldly motif and saturated color palette bring sophistication and character to the Nuray Area Rug. Power-loomed in Turkey for supreme durability, the low pile works well in high-traffic areas, such as dining and living rooms.

rug4.name: LAKSHMI Area Rug
rug4.description: The Lakshmi Area Rug is the perfect balance of bright color and fading. Hand-loomed in India from a poly-cotton blend with a flat pile for premium durability, making it ideal for high-traffic areas such as living and dining rooms.

rug5.name: ROSSEN Area Rug
rug5.description: The Rossen Area Rug is a beautiful contemporary rug that has a dazzling pattern and rich, vibrant colors. It's made from 100% wool and it's hand woven in India. The tassels on the edge provide a touch of vintage whimsy without taking away from its contemporary appeal. This striking area rug is the perfect addition to your modern home.

rug6.name: EVA Fringe Area Rug
rug6.description: The Eva Area Rug features a mixture of geometric motifs offering a stunning look with authentic braided tassels. It will instantly upgrade your living room or bedroom, making it feel a little more stylish thanks to its on-trend design.

rug7.name: HAZBETH Area Rug
rug7.description: With bold reds and bright blues, the Hazbeth Area Rug will be the focal point of any room. Featuring a distressed, faded look for a distinct vintage-inspired feel. Hand woven in India from soft micro-chenille and cotton fibers, this stain-resistant rug has a worry-free flat pile making it perfect for high-traffic areas of your home.

rug8.name: ALISO Shag Area Rug
rug8.description: Perfect for warming up any apartment or home, the Aliso Shag Collection is extra thick and cozy. Constructed with stain and shed resistant yarns that are plush and easy to color coordinate with the rest of your space.

rug9.name: MANALI Jute Area Rug
rug9.description: The Manali Jute Area Rug is hand-loomed in India giving it superior quality without the high price tag. Place it in a space that needs extra texture and warmth.

rug10.name: RHOADS Area Rug
rug10.description: The Rhoads Area Rug is handmade in India using the production technique of hand-tufting. This tufted rug are made by injecting tufts of dense wool into a fine, tight canvas, resulting in a precise, complex design.

lighting.name: STENTON Table Lamp
lighting.description: A sleek profile and fashionable glass shade make the Stenton Table Lamp a perfect fit for workspaces and living areas of all kinds!

lighting2.name: DRYDEN Area Rug
lighting2.description: A sleek profile and fashionable glass shade make the Stenton Table Lamp a perfect fit for workspaces and living areas of all kinds!

lighting3.name: FARADAY Floor Lamp
lighting3.description: The Faraday Floor Lamp is part industrial chic, part vintage throwback, and part contemporary minimalist. Combine those elements and you have one absolutely incredible lamp! The standard fabric shade is ensconced in a mesh metal cage. This gives it that cool industrial edge. The gold accents provide a glamorous contrast to the darker metal base. This handsome floor lamp is sure to draw all the right kind of attention.

lighting4.name: JAYNE Desk Lamp
lighting4.description: Lights! Camera! Action! This pint-sized film light is the perfect way to add some glitz and glam to your desk. You might not be a big-time film director, but you'll feel like a star with this on your desk.

lighting5.name: GLENN Table Lamp
lighting5.description: TThe Glenn Lamp is a modern work of art. Its simple color and cubic texture design make for a great statement piece for any room.

lighting6.name: VELES Table Lamp
lighting6.description: A marbled ceramic base and metallic accents give the Veles Table Lamp its exquisite and lavish feel. Step your pad up a notch with a Veles Lamp in one of three beautiful colors!

lighting7.name: JENSEN Pendant Lamp
lighting7.description: This stunning pendant lamp adds contemporary flair to a classic industrial style. Complete with a black wire shade and gold accents, the Jensen Pendant Lamp is a true pièce de résistance!

lighting8.name: TERESA Table Lamp
lighting8.description: If you have the shot, always go for gold! The Teresa Table Lamp is a glamorous addition to any home. And with its gold base it will always be a shining spot in your home decor, whether it's on or off.

lighting9.name: RIVERS Table Lamp
lighting9.description: The Manali Jute Area Rug is hand-loomed in India giving it superior quality without the high price tag. Place it in a space that needs extra texture and warmth.

clock1.name: STRUCTURE WALL Clock by Cloudnola
clock1.description: While most days feel like a fight against the clock, telling time doesn't need to be a task devoid of substance and style, as proven by Amsterdam label Cloudnola. Combining novel materials with up-to-the-minute technology, the classical Cloudnola clock collection mediates between modernity and traditional elements for a home necessity to count on. Tick, tock - timeless design awaits!
